title: Mac Studio vs Mac Pro (2019): Comparing Appleâ€™s top-tier desktops
content:
The recently-launched Mac Studio is the most powerful Apple Silicon Mac we’ve seen so far, and Apple made sure we know that. Thanks to the Apple M1 Ultra processor, the Mac Studio packs a lot of power in a tiny package, and it still manages to fit a lot of ports in that chassis, too.

The post Mac Studio vs Mac Pro (2019): Comparing Apple’s top-tier desktops appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Trying to decide between the new Mac Studio or the Intel-based Mac Pro? Here's what you need to know about these powerful Macs.
